definition: to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: I've got a little list I've made here called test.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一小段列表，我放在这里做为测试用。

sentences.english: The first test they did was with a virus dose of one nanogram.
sentences.chinese: 他们做先将1纳克剂量的病毒做为实验的第一步。

sentences.english: Second, it is utilized, at times, as a decoy for incorporating the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 其次，政府有时以补助做为收编反对势力的诱饵。

sentences.english: This, then, is the unique source of our strength as a health agency.
sentences.chinese: 那么这就是做为一个卫生机构我们独特的力量来源。

sentences.english: An exquisite flower adorned her dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的上衣上别一枚别致的胸花做为点缀。

sentences.english: This is the fan site of "kang ji hwan". Would you keep manners as a fan?
sentences.chinese: 这是姜志焕的个人网站，你做为焕迷愿意遵守礼仪吗？

sentences.english: As a young man how Shou Dele, a lot Maopian see.
sentences.chinese: 做为一个年轻人怎么受得了，就下了很多毛片看。

sentences.english: As far as a trial order is concerned, the quantity is by no means small.
sentences.chinese: 做为试购，这个数量绝不算少了。

sentences.english: The commercial-use power source voltage waveform will become the trigger signal source.
sentences.chinese: 使用商业用之市电电压源做为触发信号源。

sentences.english: As I mentioned before, proofs use axioms and theorems to make their case.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，证明以公理和定理做为其论据。

sentences.english: How can you use public relations as a district-level membership tool?
sentences.chinese: 您如何运用公共关系来做为地区层级的社员工具呢？

sentences.english: But a good place to start is with emotion.
sentences.chinese: 但是情感却可以做为我们讨论的开端。

sentences.english: How to improve as the World Habitat Weihai city's cultural taste and grade?
sentences.chinese: 如何提高威海做为世界人居城市的文化品位和档次？

sentences.english: As a result, China’s trade surplus will shrink along with its saving rate.
sentences.chinese: 做为加国，中国的外贸盈余将会同储蓄率一起缩水。

sentences.english: As part of the anti-obesity campaign, the government also started a healthy eating Web site.
sentences.chinese: 政府也开设了健康饮食的网站，做为反肥胖活动之一。

sentences.english: The results of our study provide important references for other schools that are debating whether to implement the small-group tutorial teaching strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本研究结果可做为其他院校推动小班教学初期之参考。

definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
in the capacity of/as
to treat as/to regard as
is both ...(and...)/since/as/being the case that
to serve as/to act as/to play the role of
to treat as/to regard as/to look upon as
certainty/without a doubt
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
to consider as/to take to be
one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
moreover/besides
admittedly (it's true that...)
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
therefore/thus/so
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to look upon as/to regard as
